tests.name: Get all todos
tests.description: GET /api/todos returns JSON array of todos

tests.name: Create new todo
tests.description: POST /api/todos creates todo and returns 201 with todo data

tests.name: Update todo
tests.description: PUT /api/todos/{id} updates completion status and returns updated todo

tests.name: Delete todo
tests.description: DELETE /api/todos/{id} removes todo and returns success message

tests.name: Error handling
tests.description: Invalid requests return proper error messages and HTTP status codes

tests.name: Port configuration
tests.description: Flask server successfully runs on port 8080

notes: All REST API endpoints working correctly. Server runs on port 8080. Ready for frontend integration.
